Package neqsim.process.ml.examples

package neqsim.process.ml.examples
Example RL environments demonstrating NeqSim ML integration.

This package contains example implementations showing how to wrap NeqSim process systems as Gym-compatible RL environments:

  • SeparatorLevelControlEnv - Separator level control

These examples can be used as templates for creating custom RL environments for specific process control applications.

Version:
1.0
Author:
ESOL
